rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3169, 3845, 4414}
(Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06PG, 09, 09-1, 09-4} and Must be enrolled in course version {3169, 3845})
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETW2111, ETX2111, ETX2121}

description: An in-depth introduction to quantitative research methods. This subject is one of two that together supply the research methodology skills and knowledge necessary for students to complete an independent research project at the honours level. It provides a comprehensive coverage of quantitative research methodologies. Topics include: survey studies/correlational field studies; forms of regression; analysis of variances; discriminant analysis; factor analysis; non-parametric statistics.
